alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 01 at 1:18PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Montgomery, Bath, Fleming and Rowan Counties through 200 PM EST... At 117 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Flemingsburg to Wades Mill. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Flemingsburg, Poplar Plains, Goddard, Craintown and Tilton around 120 PM EST. Foxport, Mount Carmel and Wallingford around 125 PM EST. Sharpsburg, Stepstone, Flat Creek and Howards Mill around 130 PM EST. Owingsville, Kendall Springs, Preston, Crooks, Peeled Oak and Reynoldsville around 135 PM EST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Craigs, Bourbon Furnace, Peasticks, Slate Valley, Olympia, Odessa, Marshall, Salt Lick, Polksville, Wyoming, Grange City, Oakley, Ramey, Moore`s Ferry, Midland, Farmers, Ringos Mills, Hilda, Sharkey, Bluestone, Freestone and Cogswell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
